name: Grow - An online class-based brawler (Canceled)
blurb: Transform on-the-fly into unique characters and battle it out in this online, team-based brawler.

rewards.reward: SNACK PACK\r\n\r\nReceive a collection of super cool wallpapers for your computer, your name in the credits as a supporter and the most important reward of all, our love! (love is optional)
EARLY BIRD DISCOUNT Get a digital copy of the game when it is released AT A DISCOUNT, the wallpaper pack and a Kickstarter exclusive cosmetic item in the game!
MEAL DEAL Get a digital copy of Grow to call your own when it is released, the super cool wallpaper pack and the Kickstarter exclusive cosmetic item!
DOUBLE DEAL For those of you who want to give the gift of game! Receive 2 digital copies of Grow, (one to gift to a friend!) the Wallpaper pack and the Kickstarter exclusive item.

BETA ACCESS APPETIZER Play Grow during Beta and help to shape the future of the game, and receive a special digital game manual, a copy of Grow at launch, a wallpaper pack and the Kickstarter exclusive in-game item!

BONUS SWAG SPECIAL Got Swag? Didn\u2019t think so! We can help you out. Get a booster pack of Grow trading cards, as well as 2 digital copies of Grow (one to gift to a friend!) as well as access to the Grow Beta and digital manual, the wallpaper pack, a printable box art and the exclusive in-game Kickstarter accessory!

T-SHIRT SPECTACULAR\r\nFor the fashion connoisseur. Receive our limited edition \u2018Grow\u2019 T-shirt, a booster pack of Grow trading cards, 2 digital copies of Grow (one to gift to a friend!) along with Beta access & digital manual, the wallpaper pack, a printable box art AND a bonus in-game T-shirt for Grumble

FIRST TOY TIER Receive an adorable Nom soft toy in the mail, 2 digital copies of the game, 1 Beta access & digital manual, the wallpaper pack, a booster pack of Grow trading Cards, the exclusive Kickstarter accessory, a printable box art and a printable high-res poster file. Includes magical horn DLC. Toot your own horn with bonus DLC! At the start of each round you can herald your own arrival with a single-use horn!

GROWL PLUSH TOY The second toy tier! You get the super cute Growl plushie, 2 copies of the game,  Beta access & digital manual, the wallpaper pack, a booster pack of Grow trading Cards, the exclusive Kickstarter accessory, a Printable box art and Printable high res poster. Includes amazing horn DLC!

DEVELOPER PASS For the budding game developer: 2 copies of the game, ALPHA Access (that\u2019s even earlier than Beta!) & digital manual as well as the wallpaper pack, a starter deck of Grow trading cards, exclusive access to our online video feeds - talk to us directly while we make the game -  aaaand the amazing horn DLC!

GRUMBLE PLUSH TOY + T-SHIRT DEAL + TRADING CARD DEAL\r\n\r\nThe ultimate toy tier! Get the cuddly Grumble plush toy, a starter deck of Grow trading cards, a limited edition T-shirt, 2 copies of the game, ALPHA access & digital manual, the wallpaper pack, the exclusive Kickstarter accessory, a printable box art and a printable high res poster

ALPHA + GRUMBLE PACK\r\nGet the cuddly Grumble plush toy, a starter deck of Grow trading Cards, a limited edition T-shirt, 2 copies of the game Alpha access & digital manual, the wallpaper pack, video chat access, exclusive Kickstarter accessory, printable box art, printable high res poster and the in-game horn DLC!

PLUSH TOY ARMY TIER Get all 3 plushies! Grumble, Growl & Nom will be delivered to your door, as well as a starter deck of Grow trading cards, a limited edition T-shirt, Alpha access  & digital manual, video chat access, 10 copies of the game to give to all your gamer friends, ultra exclusive \u2018Glutton\u2019 accessory, a wallpaper pack, exclusive Kickstarter accessory, a Printable box art and a Printable high res poster and the bonus in-game horn DLC!

THE ARCHITECT Love your own face? We know the feeling! Have a stylized copy of your face carved into a rock face on one of the maps as well as everything in the Feast tier.\r\nYou\u2019ll be listed as Guest Level Designer  in the credits!

$1000 DARWIN-NER\r\nEverything in \u2018The Feast\u2019, PLUS you can design a creature that will inhabit the Grow world. Describe the character, it\u2019s biology and how it fits into the environment. Does it live in crevices underwater or build nests inside giant flowers? Tell us and we\u2019ll work with you to design a truly imaginative monster. This creature will be present in a number of Grow maps and could potentially become a playable character further down the line. Of course you\u2019ll be listed as \u2018Guest Character Designer\u2019 in the credits!
